headline: Sempra Hydrogen Petition Tests Future Of Gas Assets And Earnings
summary: Sempra (NYSE:SRE) subsidiaries, including SoCalGas, have asked California regulators to revise hydrogen blending demonstration rules. The petition seeks removal of a major field demonstration requirement, citing updated safety research and operational data. The requested changes focus on hydrogen blending in existing natural gas pipelines used by California customers. Sempra, through utilities like SoCalGas, is closely tied to California's efforts to cut emissions while keeping gas...
